summary: This document is an internal email correspondence involving individuals from Deutsche Bank regarding accounts related to Epstein. Amanda Kirby is reaching out to check on accounts and mentions the hope that JPMorgan has consolidated the accounts. The communication reflects ongoing financial management related to Epstein's accounts.
